name: R5-BenefitCostApplicability-R4-BenefitCostApplicability
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 BenefitCostApplicability into FHIR R4

target.display: Provider is contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates
target.comment: R5 `in-network` is assumed equivalent to R4 `in-network` (no map, but codes match)
R5 `other` is assumed equivalent to R4 `other` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: Provider is  not contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates
target.comment: R5 `out-of-network` is assumed equivalent to R4 `out-of-network` (no map, but codes match)
